Package emissary.util

Class SizeUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • emissary.util.SizeUtil
  • public class SizeUtil
extends Object
    This class provides routines for approximating the RAM size of Emissary objects - primarily the IBaseDataObject.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      static long getExtractedRecordMemorySize​(IBaseDataObject ibdo)
      Approximates the amount of memory consumed by the "extracted records" in a single IBaseDataObject.
      static long getPayloadMemorySize​(IBaseDataObject ibdo)
      Approximate the amount of memory consumed by the various "payloads" of an IBaseDataObject.
      static long sizeof​(IBaseDataObject ibdo)
      Approximate the amount of RAM consumed by an individual IBaseDataObject.
      static long sizeof​(String str)
      Approximate the amount of RAM consumed by a String.
      static long sizeof​(List<IBaseDataObject> familyTree)
      Estimate the size, in bytes, of the RAM of an entire IBaseDataObject family tree.

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • sizeof

        public static long sizeof​(@Nullable
                          String str)
        Approximate the amount of RAM consumed by a String.

        See tutorial Slide 26.

        This calculation is affected by the JVM architecture and whether CompressedOops are enabled.

        Parameters:
        str - - the String to approximate
        Returns:
        The approximate size, in bytes, in RAM for str

      • sizeof

        public static long sizeof​(@Nullable
                          IBaseDataObject ibdo)
        Approximate the amount of RAM consumed by an individual IBaseDataObject. The purpose of this method is to approximate the RAM that will be consumed by a corresponding serialized/deserialized object, hence not all aspects of the IBaseDataObject are considered. Additionally, this method does not include all the "outputtable" logic that may be present in output filter, which could make the actual size smaller than is reported by this method.
        Parameters:
        ibdo - The IBaseDataObject to approximate the size of
        Returns:
        The approximate size, in bytes, in RAM for the IBaseDataObject

      • sizeof

        public static long sizeof​(@Nullable
                          List<IBaseDataObject> familyTree)
        Estimate the size, in bytes, of the RAM of an entire IBaseDataObject family tree. This is simply the sum of the sizes of the individual members of the family tree.
        Parameters:
        familyTree - - List<IBaseDataObject> representing the family tree for a document object
        Returns:
        - the approximate size, in bytes, in RAM for the familyTree

      • getExtractedRecordMemorySize

        public static long getExtractedRecordMemorySize​(@Nullable
                                                IBaseDataObject ibdo)
        Approximates the amount of memory consumed by the "extracted records" in a single IBaseDataObject. This is typically the case when the framework gets eventing datasets. These extracted records are usually treated specially and not run through the processing pipelines proper, but on output do appear as proper child IBaseDataObjects. In the case of a large dataset, these extracted records can consume huge amounts of RAM.
        Parameters:
        ibdo - - The IBaseDataObject to approximate
        Returns:
        - The approximate memory footprint, in bytes, for extracted records of an IBaseDataObject

      • getPayloadMemorySize

        public static long getPayloadMemorySize​(@Nullable
                                        IBaseDataObject ibdo)
        Approximate the amount of memory consumed by the various "payloads" of an IBaseDataObject. In this case, a payload refers to the header, footer, data (primary view), and all the alternate views.
        Parameters:
        ibdo - - The IBaseDataObject to approximate
        Returns:
        - The approximate memory footprint, in bytes, for the IBaseDataObject
